title: Manningham Gallery presents 'Apposite' and 'Imagine' Exhibitions (Manningham City Council)
text: ( Source : Manningham City Council ) 9 October 2015 From Wednesday 21 October , Manningham Art Gallery presents concurrent solo exhibitions by graduate artists Rachel Jones and Nicole Moorhouse . Rachel Jones' exhibition Apposite is a series of
